c_drag_a_server.py

00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import rospy
00004 from math import pow
00005 from math import pi
00006 from last_letter.srv import *
00007 
00008 
00009 def calc_drag(req):
00010         alpha = req.alpha
00011         #Import required parameters
00012         c_drag_p = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_drag_p')
00013         c_lift_0 = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_lift_0')
00014         c_lift_a = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_lift_a')
00015         oswald = rospy.get_param('world/oswald')
00016         b = rospy.get_param('airframe/b')
00017         S = rospy.get_param('airframe/s')
00018         AR = pow(b,2)/S
00019 
00020         response = c_drag_p + pow(c_lift_0+c_lift_a*alpha,2)/(pi*oswald*AR)     
00021         return response
00022 
00023 if __name__=='__main__':
00024         rospy.init_node('c_drag_a_server')
00025         s = rospy.Service('c_drag_a', c_drag_a, calc_drag)
00026         rospy.loginfo('c_drag_a service running')
00027         rospy.spin()
